English: I like to read books in my free time.
French: J'aime lire des livres à mes loisirs.

English: The sun is shining brightly today.
Can you give me a ride to the store?
French: Peux-tu me donner un lift au magasin ?

English: I have a cat and a dog at home.
French: J'ai un chat et un chien chez moi.
